name: copilot-bootcamp
description: Monorepo with React frontend and Node backend

scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run coverage:merge
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
